name: AKF-Mathe
description:
AKF-Mathe

Elementary arithmetic exercises game.

Oh, noble Knight!
Protect the beautiful princess,
and conquer her heart!

I hope to make math exercises a little less boring with this.

You can play it as long as you like… no, longer!

By the way, the screen on failure is intentionally dull, because there should be no incentive.

Options -h, --helpHelp -V, --versionLicense -f, --fullscreenFullscreen -eEnglish-dDeutsch/German
